class_description:
Thrown if an application tries to access or modify a specified
 field of an object, and that object no longer has that field. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can
 only occur at run time if the definition of a class has
 incompatibly changed.

Methods.method_description: Constructs a NoSuchFieldError with no detail message.

Constructs a NoSuchFieldError with the specified
 detail message.
